task.title: Strawberry Ice Cream
task.shortdesc: This recipe makes about 5 1⁄2 cups of ice cream. (about 1.4 quarts).

messagepanel.howtoavoid: Exercise caution when using a knife to prepare the ingredients

ul.li: A container with a pour spout

step.cmd: Chop the strawberries to a desired consistency. The finer the chop, the more homogenous the ice cream will be.
In a container with a pouring spout, mix together milk, sugar, and salt until the sugar is dissolved.
Pour the heavy cream, vanilla, and strawberries into the milk mixture.
Your mixture is ready to be used to make ice cream.
